Regenerate the certificate using the following signature algorithms with the respective key length:{add}
Don't use the following signature algorithms and keys:{remove}

DH_1024_config.Apache:
Run the following command to generate 1024bit DH parameters: openssl dhparam 1024 >> /path/to/cert.
To remove DH keys run the following command: sed -i '/BEGIN DH PARAMETERS/,/END DH PARAMETERS/d' /path/to/cert.
DH_1024_config.Nginx:
Run the following command to generate 1024bit DH parameters: openssl dhparam 1024 > /path/to/dhparams.
To remove DH keys disable the directive ssl_dhparam.

DH_2048_config.Apache:
To add a 2048bits DH key run the following command: cat configs/compliance/ffdhe/ffdhe2048.txt >> /path/to/cert.
To remove DH keys run the following command: sed -i '/BEGIN DH PARAMETERS/,/END DH PARAMETERS/d' /path/to/cert.
NOTE: these DH parameters are defined in RFC 7919.
DH_2048_config.Nginx:
To add a 2048bits DH key run the following command: cat configs/compliance/ffdhe/ffdhe2048.txt > /path/to/dhparams.
To remove DH keys disable the directive ssl_dhparam.
NOTE: these DH parameters are defined in RFC 7919.
